tasks.task: Participate in rice variety selection and seed improvement in Nepal.
subtasks: Growing traditional and improved rice varieties in upland and lowland fields.
Cooperate with researchers to test new rice varieties.
Choose suitable rice varieties such as IR 554355 and Radha 32 based on performance and local conditions.
Learn about variety traits like higher yields, better eating quality, and disease tolerance.

tasks.task: Adopt new rice seed production and marketing practices.
subtasks: Form commercial seed production groups with guidance from the project.
Produce high-quality seeds of new and traditional popular varieties.
Market seeds to meet local demand and improve availability.
Learn about and adopt seedling broadcasting instead of traditional transplanting.
Reduce labor input and alleviate physical strain in rice farming.

tasks.task: Expand crop diversity through intercropping and vegetable cultivation.
subtasks: Introduce seasonal and off-season vegetable growing practices.
Cultivate vegetables like cabbage, cauliflower, tomatoes, and radishes in kitchen gardens.
Generate cash income from vegetable sales, supplementing rice farming income.

tasks.task: Participate in rice variety selection and seed improvement in Nepal.**
subtasks: Growing traditional and improved rice varieties in upland and lowland fields.
Cooperate with researchers to test new rice varieties.
Choose suitable rice varieties based on performance, yield, and local conditions (e.g., IR 554355 and Radha 32).

tasks.task: Adopt new rice seed production and marketing practices.**
subtasks: Form commercial seed production groups with guidance from the project.
Produce high-quality seeds of new and traditional popular varieties.
Market seeds to meet local demand and improve availability.
Learn about and adopt seedling broadcasting (saving up to 60% labor compared to traditional transplanting).

tasks.task: Expand crop diversity through intercropping and vegetable cultivation.**
subtasks: Cultivate vegetables such as cabbage, cauliflower, tomatoes, and radishes in kitchen gardens.
Generate cash income from vegetable sales, supplementing rice farming income.
Benefit from improved food security and family needs through diversified income sources.

subtasks: Form commercial seed production groups with guidance from the project.
Produce high-quality seeds of new and traditional popular varieties.
Market seeds to meet local demand and improve availability.

Reduce labor input and alleviate physical strain.

subtasks: Cultivate vegetables such as cabbage, cauliflower, tomatoes, and radishes.
